name: EJ Analysis on GitHub
tagline: Data and R code for environmental justice (EJ) analysis
body:
### About
These GitHub repositories provide data and code (in [R](http://www.r-project.org/)) for analyzing environmental justice (EJ) data.  

### Packages
  * [countyhealthrankings](http://ejanalysis.github.io/countyhealthrankings/) - Health indicators by US County
  * [UScensus2010blocks](http://ejanalysis.github.io/UScensus2010blocks/) - 11 million Census blocks
  * [analyze.stuff](http://ejanalysis.github.io/analyze.stuff/) - General tools for data analysis
  * [proxistat](http://ejanalysis.github.io/proxistat/) - Proximity/distance analysis, and block group data
  * [ejanalysis](http://ejanalysis.github.io/ejanalysis/) - Environmental justice/ Demographic/ Environmental metrics

### More
[ejanalysis.com](http://www.ejanalysis.com)
